channel.title: How to change message for new players. [562]
channel.description: Hey, I was wondering if any of you knew how to change the server message that when a new player comes on it says it for them and only for new players. Thanks.

item.title: How to change message for new players. [562]
item.dc:creator: @owns_reece owns reece
item.description:
@owns_reece wrote:

i am a 517 coder so this might not work but go to startup and search. (this works for 517 it might not work for 562)
hope this works for u

Read full topic
item.source: How to change message for new players. [562]

item.title: How to change message for new players. [562]
item.dc:creator: @zyle1992 Zymus
item.description:
@zyle1992 wrote:

run moneygod:

umm thats server sided “esay way” go in server folder and search what it says lol if that dont work google it ima 317 coder :L but i hope that works

317/474/508/562/etc. It’s the same thing no matter which revision.[quote=“smokerboy239, post:3, topic:392969”][quote author=run moneygod link=topic=490140.msg3583950#msg3583950 date=1304024355]
umm thats server sided “esay way” go in server folder and search what it says lol if that dont work google it ima 317 coder :L but i hope that works
[/quote]The thing is, (you really think im that dumb D:) when I search anything, even the name of something I can see in the folder, I search and it says can’t find it, so I came to you guys.[/quote]

If you don’t have an IDE (which I suggest you use), then you need to search for a static string in each java file. What I mean by static string is something that doesn’t change. For example, in the string “zyle1992 has logged in.”, the static string would be “has logged in”.

Read full topic
